analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CircleCrowdsale.investByLegalTender (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#816-835):
	External calls:
	- MintableToken(token).mint(_beneficiary,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#826-827)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokenMintedPreSale (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#827-829)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#532-536) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#533-534)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#546-547) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#546-547)

TokenTimelock.TokenTimelock (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#614-619) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#615)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#622-632) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#625)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#740-747) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#743-747)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_contracts/0xbb71bc0b4739f91ba76c70251883daec80282dfa.sol#744-747)
